title: Milking a cow at Lake Metroparks Farmpark.

subtasks: Apply teat dip to cow's teats
Allow teat dip to sit for 30 seconds
Position hand around cow's udder to manually express milk
Use milking machine (claw) to suction milk from quarters
Check milk quality and udder condition through manual expression
Apply teat dip sanitizer to cow's teats
Wait 30 seconds for teat dip to sit
Manually express milk from each quarter to check quality and udder condition
Apply second teat dip sanitizer to cow's teats
Wait 30 seconds for teat dip to sit
Activate milking machine (claw) to suction milk from quarters
